verses.text_plain: The sons of Judah; Pharez, Hezron, and Carmi, and Hur, and Shobal.
verses.verse_html:
1The sons of Judah; Pharez, Hezron, and Carmi, and Hur, and Shobal. ▼
▼ Carmi: also called, Chelubai or Caleb

tokens.definition: פֶּרֶץ Perets, peh'-rets; the same as H6556 ; Perets, the name of two Israelites:—Perez, Pharez.
outline: Perez or Pharez = "breach" twin son with Zarah of Judah by Tamar and ancestor of two families of Judah, the Hezronites and Hamulites; from the Hezronites came the royal line of David and Christ

tokens.definition: חוּר Chûwr, khoor; the same as H2353 or H2352 ; Chur, the name of four Israelites and one Midianite:—Hur.

verses.text_plain: And Reaiah the son of Shobal begat Jahath; and Jahath begat Ahumai, and Lahad. These are the families of the Zorathites.
verses.verse_html:
2And Reaiah the son of Shobal begat Jahath; and Jahath begat Ahumai, and Lahad. These are the families of the Zorathites. ▼
▼ Reaiah: or, Haroeh

footnotes.body_html: ▼ Jabez: that is, Sorrowful

verses.text_plain: And Jabez called on the God of Israel, saying, Oh that thou wouldest bless me indeed, and enlarge my coast, and that thine hand might be with me, and that thou wouldest keep me from evil, that it may not grieve me! And God granted him that which he requested.
verses.verse_html:
10And Jabez called on the God of Israel, saying, Oh that thou wouldest bless me indeed, and enlarge my coast, and that thine hand might be with me, and that thou wouldest keep me from evil, that it may not grieve me! And God granted him that which he requested. ▼
▼ Oh…: Heb. If thou wilt, etc
 , ▼
▼ keep…: Heb. do me

verses.text_plain: Shallum his son, Mibsam his son, Mishma his son.
verses.verse_html: 25Shallum his son, Mibsam his son, Mishma his son.

tokens.definition: שַׁלּוּם Shallûwm, shal-loom'; or (shorter) שַׁלֻּם Shallum; the same as H7966 ; Shallum, the name of fourteen Israelites:—Shallum.
outline: Shallum = "retribution" son of Jabesh, conspirator and slayer of king Zachariah of the northern kingdom of Israel ending the dynasty of Jehu; assumed the throne and became the 15th king of the northern kingdom; reigned for one month and was killed by Menahem the 3rd son of king Josiah of Judah and subsequent king of Judah; reigned for 3 months before he was taken captive to Egypt where he was placed in chains and later died also 'Jehoahaz' husband of Huldah the prophetess in the reign of king Josiah of Judah. Maybe the same as 4 uncle of Jeremiah the prophet. Maybe the same as 3 a Simeonite, son of Shaul and grandson of Simeon a Judaite, son of Sisamai and father of Jekamiah in the family of Jerahmeel an Ephraimite, father of Jehizkiah a son of Naphtali a Korahite Levite, chief of a family of gatekeepers for the east gate of the temple maybe same as 13 son of Halohesh and ruler of a district of Jerusalem; also repairer of the wall of Jerusalem in the time of Nehemiah a priest, of the family of Eleazar, son of Zadok and father of Hilkiah in the family line of Ezra a Korahite Levite, son of Kore, father of Maaseiah, and in charge of the work of the service. Maybe same as 9 a Levite gatekeeper who had a foreign wife in the time of Ezra a Levite and descendant of Bani who had a foreign wife in the time of Ezra

verses.text_plain: And these written by name came in the days of Hezekiah king of Judah, and smote their tents, and the habitations that were found there, and destroyed them utterly unto this day, and dwelt in their rooms: because there was pasture there for their flocks.
verses.verse_html: 41And these written by name came in the days of Hezekiah king of Judah, and smote their tents, and the habitations that were found there, and destroyed them utterly unto this day, and dwelt in their rooms: because there was pasture there for their flocks.
